my apologyces to thenoobish, The game work fine as he said, but it's a little bit more difficult to put in place. I explain you my solution.

1. As he said, go to http://forum.portingteam.com/viewtopic.php?f=107&t=2227 
2. Register
3. Validate
4. a. Download and install CXZ engine (choose Black diamond when you install the package)
4. b. Download CXZ Wrapper
It's no it's a little bit complicate
5. Unzip CXZ Wrapper
6. right click and Show PAckage Contents
7. follow this path in the package and remove all content : /Contents/root/drive_c/ (so you remove Program files, users, windows, winetrickstmp)
8. Unpack the torrent
9. right click and Show package Contents
10. follow this path in the package and copy all content in the CXZ wrapper drive_c folder : /Contents/SharedSupport/CrossOverGames/support/default/drive_c/ (so you move/copy program file, users, windows, ...)
11. you must modified the CXZ Wrapper Content/Info.plist. Ref to the tuto on CXZ (http://forum.portingteam.com/viewtopic.php?f=117&t=2225&p=17858#p17858) like this : 

	CXOEMCmdLine
	/Program Files/Ubisoft/Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X/HAWX.exe
	CXOEMWorkdir
	/Program Files/Ubisoft/Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X


12. It's over.
